creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: four long lines of text with one smaller short line at left in LLQ; two red seals below shorter line of text
text: This quatrain is written is written with seven characters to each line, perhaps to reference the seven strings of the qin. For ten years I have idled my time alone like floating clouds, On my face of yellow sand, both sideburns have turned to cotton. Holding my qin, I converse with my heart: In this world, who can know this feeling'
title: Rain Over the Stream
